The Shanxi Yangcheng Daxi Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Daxi Village, Qinchi Town, Yangcheng County, Jincheng City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation & Sales Group Yangcheng Daxi Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The facility is operated by Shanxi Coal Transportation & Sales Group Yangcheng Daxi Coal Industry Co Ltd.
